channel.title: News on bitesized

item.title: change of scene is out
item.description: change of scene, our new single, is out. we’re particularly proud of how it turned out. you can find links to it here.

item.title: we made our first video
item.description: we released a video for the acoustic version of dissociate. you can check it out here.
